title: Ranvir Shorey breaks his silence on split with Konkona Sen Sharma
text:
Ranvir Shorey and Konkona Sen Sharma put a sudden end to their fairytale marriage after the two decided to announce their mutual separation on Twitter. While both of them maintained a stern silence on the reasons behind it, Ranvir and Konkona made their split official.
While we recently met Konkona who's busy promoting her next flick Talvar , she didn't want to comment on the topic. But Ranvir who attended the trailer launch of his next film Titli immediately responded when asked about the same. "Yes, I do believe in the institution of marriage. I don't blame anything but myself for my separation."
Although still the reasons aren't too clear, most gossip columns suggest that it was long time coming. Anyway, we hope the two have a happy life here onwards.
